name: Planet Ball (Quentin Eudeline)
description:
Planet Ball is a 1 VS 1 side view shooter where you play as aliens challenging each other in intergalactic planet ball competitions. Throw asteroids at your oponent to destroy the planet on wich he sits. The terrain is obstructed by other planets that you can use at your advantage hitting them and creating chain effects !

• Team :

    - Louis Assié  :  game programmer 

    - Emilien Massemin  : chara artist, 3D artist   
        → https://www.artstation.com/emilien         
        → https://itch.io/profile/emassemin

    - Valentin Boyaval : game programmer
        → https://www.artstation.com/cromach         
        → https://cromach.itch.io/

    - Valentin Liebaert  : 3D artist, level artist, tech artist 
        → https://www.artstation.com/liebaert           
        → https://vliebaert.itch.io/

    - Quentin Eudeline : game designer,  tech artist, sound designer
        → https://www.artstation.com/quentineudeline

• Tools : 3ds Max, Unity, Substance Painter,  Photoshop

Made in 48hs during Brains Eden Jam #2019 ("Chain reaction")
